participant_1.background:

I didn't spend much time with my family, but I improved my English and made a lot of new friends.
1984 is my favorite book.
I love the energy of the bar on Halloween.
I started my own business and now work from home, which allows me to take my morning walks to the beach more often.

content.text: Hello, I'm moving to a new city to pursue my culinary dreams.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a chef, but I never had the time or money to go to culinary school.
I work at a grocery store and I save up money to take classes at the local community college.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great chef.
Thank you! I'm excited to start this new chapter in my life.
I'm sure you'll do great. What's your favorite food to cook?
I love making pasta and pizza.
Mine too! I love making homemade pasta.
Me too! It's so much better than store-bought.
I know right? And it's not that hard to make.
I know, right? I make it all the time.
